Wishing a Happy New Year to all our democratic friends around the world.
In the year ahead, I hope Taiwan will continue to build momentum and deepen global partnerships.
May you and your loved ones enjoy peace, health and prosperity in 2026. https://t.co/93wQKSBy8i

Witnessed a landmark MOU as a Taiwanese firm partners with Palau‚Äôs Melekeok State to develop an international-standard golf course near the Presidential Office‚Äîadvancing sustainable tourism, diversifying Palau‚Äôs economy, and deepening #Taiwan‚Äì#Palau partnership built on trust. https://t.co/3NwBRWQaLP

As a Pacific partner, #Taiwan stands ready to support #Palau‚Äôs hosting of the 2026 PIF. Guided by the Pacific Way, we‚Äôre sharing Taiwan‚Äôs strengths through practical cooperation‚Äîfrom green transport to digital, energy, health, and resilience‚Äîturning partnership into real results. https://t.co/sfWeoc0JdD

Met President @Surangeljr at Palau‚Äôs One Stop Shop, a symbol of #Taiwan‚Äì#Palau partnership. We reviewed ongoing cooperation and discussed Palau‚Äôs hosting of the 2026 PIF, showcasing joint efforts in renewable energy and sustainable development toward shared prosperity. https://t.co/Cp8tMuJwBs

Safely arrived in #Palau. Grateful to President @Surangeljr & the First Lady for their warm hospitality, & to Minister Gustav Aitaro for the gracious welcome. With partners from tourism, healthcare, and green energy, we aim to deepen Taiwan‚ÄìPalau cooperation & shared prosperity. https://t.co/BHihXWTZpW

Returning to beautiful #Palau, leading enterprises from the tourism, sustainability, and healthcare sectors to deepen the Taiwan‚ÄìPalau partnership and build shared prosperity. https://t.co/51dl2xOq1k

Honored to welcome Knesset Indo-Pacific Chair @MKOhadTal back to Taiwan. We discussed strengthening ties in public health, digital economy, disaster resilience & high-tech talent. #Taiwan & #Israel will continue working together as democratic partners.

On #HumanRightsDay, we honor those who advanced #Taiwan‚Äôs democracy. Through human rights diplomacy, we promote gender equality, health, and dignity, standing with global partners to defend freedom and democracy against authoritarian pressure. https://t.co/qmsvUzrl38

Glad to meet Philippine Representative Corazon Padiernos. We reviewed progress from recent trade visits & reaffirmed Taiwan‚Äôs commitment to the #Taiwan‚Äì#Philippine Economic Corridor. We look forward to deepening cooperation in trade, talent cultivation & smart agriculture. https://t.co/S9WcSRxVFC

Honored to join #AIT‚Äôs tea celebrating 85 years of IVLP. Since 1940, IVLP has connected 190 countries & 230k leaders, including 1,300 from# Taiwan. Grateful for AIT‚Äôs partnership as Taiwan continues strengthening cooperation with the #US and democratic partners. https://t.co/sGF7Xk9L2x

Honored to host the Taiwan-US Committee Garden Party at Taipei Guest House. Welcomed #AIT Director Raymond Greene & AIT Class principal Michael Graham. We celebrated #Taiwan‚Äì#US friendship and shared festive joy while deepening ties in education, tech, and democracy. https://t.co/Msmg0csgw6

Appreciate the new U.S. National Security Strategy highlighting Taiwan‚Äôs vital role in global supply chains and #IndoPacific security. We thank President Trump for his steadfast support for #Taiwan and our shared commitment to safeguarding regional peace and stability.

Joined President @ChingteLai in welcoming Ambassador Elliott & the @NATLCOMMITTEE delegation. We discussed cross-strait issues, Indo-Pacific security, and #Taiwan-#US economic ties. Taiwan will keep bolstering defense resilience and deepening our partnership with the US. https://t.co/Z3wMi8rx09

Honored to meet @medwma President Dr. Kitulu, Chair Dr. Resneck & Sec.-Gen. Dr. Kloiber. I thanked WMA for steadfast support for #Taiwan‚Äôs participation in the WHO. Taiwan will keep working with global partners to advance medical diplomacy & strengthen global health. https://t.co/mdVpuEBWdb

Taiwan is honored to host the 2027 ICN Congress. I met with ICN CEO Howard Catton & Italo Goyzueta and asked MOFA to fully support TWNA on visas, logistics & reception. We look forward to welcoming nursing professionals from around the world with Taiwan‚Äôs warm hospitality. https://t.co/l9eQVnSGzS

Grateful to President Trump for signing the Taiwan Assurance Implementation Act into law, & to the U.S. Congress for passing it unanimously. This reaffirms the rock-solid #Taiwan‚Äì#US partnership. We will continue working with our American friends to advance our shared security & https://t.co/qdEDzdDiam

Warm congratulations to Prime Minister Philip J. Pierre on his reelection. #Taiwan and #SaintLucia share a solid and enduring partnership, and we treasure the bond. We look forward to deepening our cooperation for the benefit of both our peoples.
